segments.text: I notice the angled view of the kitchen, sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces away, polishing that plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I see the faucet blasting water that's now overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It sheets down the front, pooling on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepping in it, but her neutral expression persists.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess; the cabinets are getting drenched too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Shifting left, the open cabinets expose the tempting cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the two-step stool, which looks unsteady as can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is bold, one hand in, plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl cooperates from below, arm raised in hopeful plea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This secret cookie raid has me smiling at their audacity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the slippery floor from the water adds real danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone supervising these kids properly?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's garden view offers a calm escape from the frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR
